definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The big boys jumped into the river but little Ned hung back.
sentences.chinese: 大些的男孩子都跳進河裏了，但小內德畏縮不前。

sentences.english: The two boys vied with each other for the first place.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個男孩子爭第一名。

sentences.english: Voluntary workers built a road to the boy's camp.
sentences.chinese: 自願的工人建了一條路，通到男孩子們的營地。

sentences.english: Most boys keep them locked in their lockers and they're turned off.
sentences.chinese: 大多數男孩子把手機鎖在儲物櫃裏，並把手機關掉。

sentences.english: The boy was apprenticed to a bricklayer.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩子被送給一個泥瓦匠當學徒。

sentences.english: Can boys like you too not easy.
sentences.chinese: 可男孩子都像你這樣也太不好辦了。

sentences.english: All of the boys, without exception, were cross-examined.
sentences.chinese: 所有的男孩子無一例外地都受到盤問。
這些男孩子正在抽陀螺。

sentences.english: It took the boy half an hour to fix Sue's computer.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩子花了半個小時修蘇的電腦。

sentences.english: But that loses a tall masculine kid to phone beard Asian.
sentences.chinese: 而那名瘦高的男孩子叫胡東。

sentences.english: The little boy can sketch out a horse quickly.
sentences.chinese: 這小男孩子能迅速成地色畫出一匹馬。

sentences.english: The boys teased the dog by pebbling it with acorns.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子們用橡樹果打狗逗它玩。

sentences.english: That hat's too big. It keeps slipping down over the boy's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 那頂帽子太大，老是滑下來遮住那男孩子的眼睛。

sentences.english: All the boys shone up to her the first day she joined the company.
sentences.chinese: 她頭一天到公司上班，所有的男孩子都趨之若騖。

sentences.english: And when the dragon saw that he was cast to the earth, he persecuted the woman who brought forth the man-child.
sentences.chinese: 龍見自己被摔在地上，就逼迫那生男孩子的婦人。

sentences.english: Many boys courted Lynn , but she turned them all down.
sentences.chinese: 許多男孩子向林恩求婚，但都被她拒絕了。

definition: erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
